Body: I know the spotify app will allow this because I can have a phone call while listening. However, I am not aware of this working with a podcast app.Is it possible for a podcast app to play while another music player is playing? Please site examples.
Title: Can a podcast player not use 'audio focus' so that one can listen simultaneous with a music player?

history.Text: I know spotify will allow this because I can have a phone call and her my music - and because Runtracker will give me audio updates on my run during playback. However, I do not know of a podcast player that will not interrupt music playback.
Searching for podcast player that does not use 'audio focus' so that I can listen simultaneous with Spotify

history.Comment: added 7 characters in body; edited title
